about_the_game:
A Ridiculously Awesome Card Game About, Well... Everything!

Dive into sharks, Norse gods, cute cats, future tech, Chinese folklore, and basically everything else with over 3,000 cards from 150+ wildly diverse collections

Battle in an ever-growing variety of exciting, themed arenas, including Space, History, and Science - each with its own special effects that can sway the tide of battle and help secure your victory!

Play cards with friends online! Create unique combinations and build the ultimate battle decks to compete against your friends. Participate in weekly CUE Leagues and events, either solo or with friends!

Trade with anyone, anywhere and get new cards for FREE! Enjoy a platform built for avid collectors like you. Don’t just trade... elevate your collection and make new friends along the way.

Earn rewards, trophies, and epic new collectibles as you climb the leaderboards to win big in-game prizes. Compete in card duels and matches to claim daily free rewards. Card collectors, are you ready to grow your CUE collection and dominate the competition?

Discover secret recipes to craft special cards, or fuse duplicates to create all-new, super-powerful cards!

Available on both desktop PC and mobile, so you can play anywhere, anytime. Register your account and grow your collection across multiple platforms!
detailed_description:
A Ridiculously Awesome Card Game About, Well... Everything!

Dive into sharks, Norse gods, cute cats, future tech, Chinese folklore, and basically everything else with over 3,000 cards from 150+ wildly diverse collections

Battle in an ever-growing variety of exciting, themed arenas, including Space, History, and Science - each with its own special effects that can sway the tide of battle and help secure your victory!

Play cards with friends online! Create unique combinations and build the ultimate battle decks to compete against your friends. Participate in weekly CUE Leagues and events, either solo or with friends!

Trade with anyone, anywhere and get new cards for FREE! Enjoy a platform built for avid collectors like you. Don’t just trade... elevate your collection and make new friends along the way.

Earn rewards, trophies, and epic new collectibles as you climb the leaderboards to win big in-game prizes. Compete in card duels and matches to claim daily free rewards. Card collectors, are you ready to grow your CUE collection and dominate the competition?

Discover secret recipes to craft special cards, or fuse duplicates to create all-new, super-powerful cards!

Available on both desktop PC and mobile, so you can play anywhere, anytime. Register your account and grow your collection across multiple platforms!

name: Cards, the Universe and Everything

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7 (64-bit) or higher
  • Processor: Intel Core i3-2120 or AMD FX-4100
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD Graphics 4000 or equivalent
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10 (64-bit)
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-4460 or AMD Ryzen 3 1200
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 750 Ti or AMD Radeon R7 260X
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 2 GB available space

reviews:
“A winning combination of gentle humour and eclectic trivia…”
Droid Gamers

“A solid, accessible, well-balanced card battler…”
Gamezebo
short_description: Cards, the Universe and Everything is a unique trading card game with almost limitless possibilities: Dinosaurs, Norse gods, blue-footed boobies, Samurai, volcanoes, even the god particle. With the universe’s thingamabobs and endless strategies, are you ready for this gloriously bonkers game?
supported_languages: English, Italian, Spanish - Spain, Portuguese - Brazil
